meaning: She is the unbroken lineage of Gurus (Guru मन्डल)- (manḍala)-) from Sadāshiva to one’s own guru.
commentary:
थे त्रदितिओनल् गुरु मन्डल इस् – (The traditional guru manḍala is –)

Sadāshiva samarambhām vyāsa shankara madhyamāmAsmad ācharya paryantām vande Guru paramparām.

इन् दत्त त्रदितिओन्, wए प्रय् तो ओउर् गुरु मन्डल – (In Datta tradition, we pray to our guru manḍala –)

Dattatreya samarambhām nrusimhādhika madhyamāmSacchidananda paryantām vande Guru paramparām.

As the Divine Mother represents all the lineages of Gurus, She is गुरु-मण्डल-रूपिणी। (Guru-maṇḍala-rūpiṇī.)
